field.name: summary
field.value: add TryEnterXXX to SlimReaderWriterLock for use in silverlight

field.name: description
field.value: add TryEnterXXX to SlimReaderWriterLock for use in silverlight

comment.author: simoncropp
comment.text: This will require a mini release of the core as i need this change in both DP2 and IOC to continue of the silverlight build

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: and why is this necessary? The change I mean, not the release...

comment.author: simoncropp
comment.text:
in IOC there are several usages of ReaderWriterLockSlim.IsWriteLockHeld and ReaderWriterLockSlim.IsReadLockHeld
Since Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim is replaced by Castle.Core.SlimReaderWriterLock SlimReaderWriterLock needs to have similar functionality.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: applied. I can't close this issue since I'm not an admin in this project :/

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
